QuestData.Title: Scouting Report: On the Right Track
QuestData.Description: MOST of what Riko said is true.$b$bWe didn't dare pursue Gorrok - the Horde's numbers here are far too few. Our forces can only sustain so many losses, and frankly, we don't know how powerful that witch really is.$b$bLet me pick up where the hozen left off...

Objectives.Objective: Search the Serpent's Heart for signs of life
